mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction_info (goods_name, auction_num, auction_price, auction_time, auction_user_id, remark) VALUES (#{goodsName},#{auctionNum},#{auctionPrice},#{auctionTime},#{auctionUserId},#{remark});
mapper.select:
select id,title from remind_info
user_id = #{userId} and status = #{status}

select * from goods_info
and goods_name like concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')

with a as ( select count(login_time) as passenger_flow from user_info
login_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '${timeNode}' MINUTE and login_time <= NOW()
) SELECT a.passenger_flow,SUM(auction_info.auction_price) as sales_volume from a,auction_info
auction_info.auction_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '${timeNode}' MINUTE and auction_info.auction_time <= NOW() group by passenger_flow
WITH a as ( SELECT SUM(auction_num * auction_price) AS price,auction_user_id FROM auction_info GROUP BY auction_user_id ) select MAX(price) from a
